name: Yoshimoto Muchicco Dai-kessen: Minami no Umi no Gorongo-tou
overview: Yoshimoto Muchicco Dai-Kessen is a Playstation game based on the anime series Yoshimoto Muchcco Monogatari (Yoshimoto Insect Stories) that was released in Japan in the year 1999 and is comedy using insects as the characters. The game is a collection of mini games that takes place in different places of the island. To advance to different places the player have to pass the mini games. The mini games are really different: Jumping in a field through different squares until fall in a character, running in a race against another character, try to catch a character, etc. After defeat those characters you can go to the place where the strange machine is and there try to defeat those character in the race.
